summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2009 CHEVROLET COBALT.  WHILE DRIVING APPROXIMATELY 30 MPH, THE ENGINE STALLED WITHOUT WARNING.  THE VEHICLE WAS ABLE TO BE RESTARTED AND RESUMED NORMAL OPERATION.  THE FAILURE OCCURRED IMMEDIATELY AFTER THE VEHICLE WAS SERVICED FOR NHTSA CAMPAIGN NUMBER: 14V047000 (AIR BAG, ELECTRICAL SYSTEM).  THE VEHICLE WAS NOT REPAIRED AND THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOTIFIED.  THE APPROXIMATE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 60,000.
